summary: This mod adds the playable race \"Forsworn\" to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a race that was mentioned and seen in Skyrim, but you could never play as one. Well, now you can.
The Forsworn are based off of the Bretons, and have the power to cast fear on an opponent of any level once per day.

Skill bonuses:
One-Handed(10)
Destruction(10)
Restoration(5)
Light Armor(5)
Block(5)
Sneak(5)
Two-Handed(5)

CHANGELOG:
V1.0- initial release.
author: IronPlatypus
